tagline: Explore the flourishing world of Agriculture
subtagline: Cultivate growth. Empower futures. Navigate the agriculture domain with clarity and purpose.
introduction: Agriculture has now emerged as one of the popular courses after grade 12. Agriculture has different courses ranging from UG courses like B.Tech, B.Sc, B.S to Diploma courses. A few of the popular courses are Horticulture, Agricultural Engineering, Forestry, Sericulture. Agricultural courses aim to provide training to implement modern agricultural techniques and technologies in the real world scenario.
